data.name: Other people's fiancee became my woman
data.detailed_description:
If you like this game, please add it to your wish list~
All materials are genuine license

About this game:


There is a girl next door to you who makes your heart move. One night~ you heard her sad cry. It turned out that her fiancé died for some reason because she was hit hard. You decide to take the place of her fiancé and do your duty to save her, both physically and mentally...


This is a choice-driven visual novel (vn).
In this game, you play as a young man full of energy and desire, meet the girl next door, enter her life, and get to know all aspects of her...  

The game contains:

Realistic and beautiful 3d characters.
More than 150,000 words of text.
Over 100 cg animation scenes.
One-click to unlock cg recall for immediate use.

data.short_description: You are a gentleman, one night ~ you heard the sad cry of the girl next door, to comfort her, you knocked on the door and entered her room...
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

content_descriptors.notes:
- This Game may contain some sex implications not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
- The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
